values:
Well, not happy days for me. I have physical problems that lend themselves very nicely to feeling anxious. Ever feel like your safe haven, your home is closing in on you? It feels like that when I get anxious, I have to be out in the open air. I think it is called claustrophobia. Who knew I had a little bit of claustrophobia in me? Who knew I would suffer from an anxiety disorder. Who knew I would break? Who knew I would need so much help, who knew I would feel so horribly wrong? Not me. img src="http://images.quizilla.com/G/gloomfairie/1046219609_marquis.gif" border="0" alt="marquis">
You are the Marquis Da Sade. Even stripped of
exaggerations, Your real life was as dramatic
and as tragic as a cautionary tale. Born to an
ancient and noble house, you were married
(against your wishes) to a middle-class heiress
for money, caused scandals with prostitutes and
with your sister-in-law, thus enraging your
mother-in-law, who had you imprisoned under a
lettre de cachet for 14 years until the
Revolution freed you. Amphibian, protean,
charming, you became a Revolutionary,
miraculously escaping the guillotine during the
Terror, only to be arrested later for
publishing your erotic novels. You spent your
final 12 years in the insane asylum at
Charenton, where you caused another scandal by
directing plays using inmates and professional
actors. You died there in 1814, virtually in
the arms of your teenage mistress. You are a revolutionary deviant. I applaud you.

Which Imfamous criminal are you?
brought to you by Quizilla
I just realized I am very sad....no reason

Well well well, it has been ever so long.  I feel like my body has suffered a breakdown along with my mind.  I went out and did a full day today, it was too much.  My mind is tired, and my body is tired and that is the perfect setup for an anxiety attack.  I had low level anxiety at school today and an attack this evening after dinner as the little one was saying how much I didn't love him.  They are changing though, the feelings behind them are changing.  No longer is it abject fear, more of an extreme anxious sadness.  This is one hell of a journey I am on.  They go away much faster now as well.  I wonder what that all means?
Later

Gots to be makin this quick, have older son to take to camp.  Come back here and clean his room, get it all ready for painting.  Yay.  I figured out the color scheme.  Again a yay.  What a life I lead.  Kids this, kids that.  Not much to really talk about Me.  Foung Meself a spiritual therapist, yay.  Highlight of My fucking life yay.  Oh the card game night went sooooo well.  Jen had Me in stitches.  I wish I could do it again this tuesday, but I think I would be pushing My luck with My brother as babysitter.  Well, I guess it doesnt hurt to ask.  A is gone on monday, comes back before the end of the week, and then leaves again.  It cant be much fun for him.  He will be travelling for the next month, here there and japan as well.  Craziness.  I dont think I am going to go to the cottage this year.  I can't find anyone to go woth Me.  Ach well, it probably would have been insane with the two kids anyway.  Or perhaps it wouldn't be insane, I dont know, and wont get the chance to find out.  Alright, I am outta here.
Ya know what they say....all those psychiatrists and such....if you know or think or suspect you are insane........your not.

Ever have the feeling you are trapped in your body.  I had that feeling yesterday.  I felt like I was looking inward and the outside world was becoming smaller.  I fight those feelings, I dont like them as I like to look outwards.  I want to see the world and interact with it, not get lost in my own mind.  It just reminds me of how seperate we all are from eachother.  Perhaps sex is a way where humans try to connect.  To connect on a deeper level then speech could ever do.  We are always trying to connect, well most of us, and the question remains, do we really?  Perhaps love is the ultimate connection.  Although I have seen love that was not returned, so what is the connection there?  Verrrry interesting.  No, I believe love does connect on a fundamental level.  I also think there is more to connection than just the physical on this plane of existence.  

Who connects with me?  lol  or should I say concurs
Cal

heyheyheyhey  
I am tired.  Hubby kept me up last night.  Wink Wink nudge nudge say no more say no more.  Which reminds me, there was a special on Monty Python last night, saw about half of it.  How monty python came into being and the rest, but I didn't see the rest.  Tis alright, will catch it another time...I hope. 
We are off to Jeniffeffers house today yayayayayayay.  Dropping the kids off at the parental units.  An adult day.  WOOOOOOOW  How often does that happen in my lifetime anymore.  In my tired stupor, I am excited about this.  We went to see Scooby Doo yesterday.  Emo sat through pretty much the whole thing and really enjoyed it.  A take note!  Emo did sit through most of it, enraptured, I was the one sitting beside him, not you.  He enjoyed it!  ach, nevermind, I am rambling from thoughts running through my brain at lightning speed.  Hold on, this might be a good time for poetry, lets see.....
I wish words, stuck in my mind
stayed with me a while, whispering thoughts into my head
waited to be caught up in my web of sentences.
I wish sounds, stayed a while in the air
looked around for an ear to listen to their soft hums 
came out of my mouth in jubilant beauty.
I wish all my thoughts could be written down
mulled over and looked right 
chased away, brought to my bosom to love.
I wish I had my words back

Dang sarah for all these quizzes lol
:: how jedi are you? :: Not bad not bad, but we always new I fight on the side of good, but will kick ass if I have too!!!!!!!
The B-Movie That Suits Me Is:

Flesh Gordon: In the 70's 'big
budget' porns were all the rage.
These hybrids combined b-movie sets
and scripts with humpalicious action,
while not hardcore like modern stuff.
The ultimate was Flesh Gordon, now
regarded as a comedy.

Find out which b-movie suits you.
Mannnn is that just Me or what????? That is too much, laugh, guffaw and well whaddyaknow? LMFAO
Boy are we trying to figure this David thing out so we can send it to the lawyer, slowwww but worth it

cool, man, you're a saxophone. that's just awesome. you're very laid-back and easygoing, just like most of your parts. you have fierce section loyalty and can get slightly competitive at times. but, hey, you're a jazz instrument, so it's all good.
Which band instrument are you? Take the quiz here!

Hey hey, 
Back again, with more stories to tell....well not really.  Just coasting the summer, spring, fall like weather here.  How do you tell a three year old yesterday it was warm enough to have a picnic, swimming, today it is to cold to go outside in pajama's.  Well it is cold and he is out there now.  Kids are smart I tell ya that much.  He came in and put his cold feets from the cold pool under the sheet, I put a blanket on him. LOL   I got the updated information for the MA I want from JFK university.  Oh man it would be like a dream come true!  It is everything I have ever wanted, right up to the studying a discipline like meditation or yoga everyday on ones own.  I love yoga, would love to get into it again.  However, I am not holding up high hopes about going.  Tis nice to have a dream though.  Sex show is on this weekend.  Hmmm make plans to go, now.  Gooooood idea. YAY.  Let ya know all about it on monday.  hehehehe  Kate came over yesterday for a quick tea and a quick chat.  Then we all went over there yesterday so My kids could play with her kids, was interesting.  She reminds Me of Sue, but not as ditzy front.  She warned Me about all the kids in her townhouse complex.  I did get a nasty feeling from them, so no more playing with the kids in there, too the park with us!!!   They are moving up north at the end of this month, so that is that for friends in this neighborhood, so far.  The woman next door, nice nice lady, but older.  We shall see, it has only been three months.  Jeeeeez.  Tomorrow, meeting spice always a nice treat.  Going to spend money, alwasy a nice treat.  Lunch at Kiva's.  All in all it is going to be a nice day.  If I remember correctly, supposed to be good weather as well.  hmmmmm I am formulating a plan in My head about sunday, this could work!  Laters

There seems to be young people working at the parks and rec these days because of the opseu strike.  
I met someone I have not seen in ohhhh fourteen odd years.  I knew him in grade and high school, was never really good friends with him, but he was ok.  We spent a good three hours talking.  Mostly him talking about his life.  I thoroughly enjoyed it.  We are going to get together with him and his "friend" (girl) sometime soon.  This should be interesting to talk to A. about.  He is almost a lawyer, but really good at what he does.  I would like him to write up our living wills.  He wont take money for it though, he doesn't like money.  He said a dinner will do.  lol  I think if this actually happens A.  will convince him to take something for his time.  From how I hear him talk, he is really good at what he does, and dedicated to helping his fellow man.  He is a reallly nice guy.  I hope his "friend" sees this sooner than later, cause there aint many like that around anymore.  I would like to hook him up with my dad so he can begin making money in a way that doesn't offend his sense of, hmmmm what did he say, principles.  He believes the law should be there for everyone, so he would probably be working for the poor.  I told him basically how to do that and still make money.  My dad is really the one to talk to about this, perhaps he will take me up on my offer.  That would be cool to be involved with, if even just to help him out.  I like dealing with worthwhile causes, and meeting old friends.  and making new ones all over again. :)  Very interesting day indeed!

Well spice was wondering why I didn't write in here for a while.  Look at the time this was written.  I haven't been to sleep yet.  I am praying that I will throw up so the pain from the bugs in my stomach and intestines will finally leave me alone.  Happy Birthday to me.  I hope to God my brother can help me out tomorrow, otherwise A. stays home from work, cause I will be completely useless to my two kids.  One of which had a fever this evening of over 104.  Why the fuck is this happening to me?  What the hell did I ever do to deserve all of this?  I wonder if I am going to die in this house?

A found My journal this evening.  He was duly upset by it all.  We chatted for a few hours and I have come to some insights.  He is a truly wonderful man.  I dont write enough about the good things in My life.  That is because it is not cathartic to do so?  or is it because I am a depressed individual more often than I care to admit.  Now that I think about it, I see others writing about the happy times in their lives.  Perhaps I just dont find My happy times all that interesting compared to most.  Yes, definitely depressed.  Time to do something about it.  I love A. That is for sure.  He is My rock!  I can only see us growing closer as time goes on, as long as we (mostly I) keep the communication flowing freely.  Things are definitely looking up.  Wish I could feel that in My heart, but the time will come.  Interesting development, architectural landscaping.  Think I might go to community college to learn such a thing.  I just loved mowing the lawn way to much.  Want to work with the earth too.  Bedtime for bonzo, although I dont feel much like sleeping, I do have a life tomorrow.

Why is it that I have to swallow My feelings and pretend I am happy with the one person who I should be able to feel anything with?  Who I should be able to tell anything too.  Whom I should be able to depend upon to understand when he has hurt Me, Not turn it around and somehow make it My fault that I am feeling so negative.  I should never ever tell him when I am not feeling well mentally.  He always finds a way to piss Me off and make Me feel bad.  Damn it all.  Luckily, luckily this happens very rarely, cause I rarely tell him how I am feeling until after I feel better.  Usually we get along fine and dandy, which is nice.

Well the weather is not looking so good so far, but then again, it is a whole day until the birthday party and the weather network says it will be mostly sunny!!!!  Pray pray pray.  I want this party outside, we planned for it primarily outside, I want it outside!  So I wake up at five in the morning and I find it very hard to get back to sleep.  It is that damned sugar thing again, cause half an hour later, I am gone.  Well acidophilus, eventually, hopefully, will do the trick.  dats all she wrote

Hey,
Been one hell of a few weeks for Me.  Tomorrow is My little one's birthday party.  I am looking forward to it.  Lots of cleaning up though.  I want to go to California.  That is My new chant.  JFK University, transpersonal psychotherapy, yeah, thats the life.  I want to go to California!  ATI lives in San Jose, just a little transfer and we are off.  I want to go to California!!  Sunshine, heat, sunshine, more heat, I could certainly live with that for a few years.  Yup, California is looking mighty pretty from where I am sitting.  Hmmm I want to put up My painting before tomorrow, wonder if A will go for it.  Doubt it.  But I got just the place for it too go too.  Hmmmmm.  Lots to do still and here I sit on the puter, well dinner first.

I had one hell of a hellish night last night.  This thing with David is getting out of hand.  But today I go and see the Yoko Ono exhibit.  I am looking forward to that, especially because I will have NO kids for a couple hours...:)  I dont know if A is going to be coming, cause he looks like he is real sick.  We didnt get the best sleep last night.  I dont mind if he stays home then Me and Jen will go, that would be great!!!  Laters

yucky flu bug, yucky flu bug, I hate you, I hate you, go away now, go away now, yucky flu, yucky flu, sung to the toon of frerachache, ok so I cant spell in french, go figure it out.  Damn if I dont still have My amazing, rich, well thought out sense of humor even when I am sick and coughing up really interesting green chunks of well never mind.  Not much going on here.  Staying home alot, which has been My lot since I moved in.  Hmmmm seems to Me that is not such a bad thing today.  I wonder if I am out of My funk, cause it seems I am looking up these days.  Dis is a good thing.  We will know for sure in a little while.  Well, just looking for a few professors to talk about writing My undergraduate thesis with next year.  Looks promising actually.  So, no, I dont have to take that half course in death and dying.  ;(  Perhaps I will take it anyway......ah no.  Think about it, by this time next year, I will be an honours b.a. student from york u.  WHooooofucking hooooo only took Me fourteen years to get it.  LoL  But I did so much in those fourteen years.  I dont mind.  I did a good job of cutting My finger yesterday, and it was for such a stupid reason too.  Dont it all figure.  Not like the time I cut My thumb to the bone and kept going, the bone actually stopped the blade.  I nicked the bone and let Me tell you, bone takes a long time to heal. Ouchie.  Doc said, could use a couple stitches, I said sure, he said, and I quote, "we have to put a needle inside the wound for every stitch".  I went home, kept it freshly bandaged, and narry a scar to be seen.  Needles in the wound My ass!!!  I hear the faint sound of dinging in Mine ears.  But nothing is happening on the computer, must be hallucinatin.  There it is again, I think it is on the tele behind Me.  Well home all day, as usual.  Laterz

Which Trainspotting Character Are You?
OK, I just had to put this in, I dont remember a lot of trainspotting, but I thought she was a pretty good character to describe Me.

Find your emotion!

Doesnt it figure

Fell asleep with L last night.  I think nine hours is enough sleep for this one.  Just boom and I was out, woke  up when A came in the room at eleven.  Wierd.  Anyway, mothers day has arrived.  A has nothing planned.  I have nothing planned.  What I want to do, of course I will not be able to do.  I want to go to the AGO and see Yoko Ono's exhibit but I can't do that with two kids.  Isn't mothers day supposed to be spent with the kids anyway.  David fucked up again.  It is becoming completely out of the realm of reality with him.  But this time he had some bitch lie for him and then argue with Me.  Some women I dont even know.  Well I think it is time to think about supervised visits.  And ya know, he still hasn't called us back from yesterday.  I guess he really doesn't want to see his son.  That is the only thing I can think of.  
Movie Review: SPIDERMAN
Ok it is hard for Me not to give a completely biased view, but what the hell  this is My journal so I can bias away.  I loved it.  It was great!!  Better than Batman, but I was never really that fond of batman.  A lot of comic book schtick, and the storyline stayed pretty true to the comic book.  I like that.  Gives the movie integrity when it is a movie from a comic book.  The best thing about the movie....when Peter Parker is in the Spiderman outfit fighting bad guys, he makes smart ass comments.  He is still just Peter Parker, not some super duper, "I can save the world" hero, just plain ole Petee fighting the bad guys.  Go Pete Go!!!!  Lots of good special effects, good casting, (I wonder if the green goblin was really willem defoe's voice, damn creepy!), Kirstun Dunst has amazing red hair.  Negatives?  Well some of the technical stuff was not very well done.  One thing that was not true to the comic book, he gains the ability to spin webs, where in the comic he had to make a device to spin webs, for various reasons this should have stayed true to the book.  All in all I had a great time watching it.  Main reason I liked it...a lot of character development, not a lot of fighting, although it had its share of that too.  Must see movie, if you like the idea of comic book movies.

Hey there,
Lets see, I figured out how to change, identities.  A's brother stayed over for a couple days.  I am feeling much better physically, but still a little sick.  That I can live with.  I am planning for this weekend to be a good one!  Spider man and then Yoko Ono's exhibit at the AGO.  I think that is a great mothers day, even though it has nothing to do with the kids lol.  Yeah I would say perfect.  Have A run around after the little one while I look at the exhibit.  Works for Me.  I am planning on buying Myself something really  nice for My birthday.  Damn I think I deserve it.  Later

Well well, feeling a little better today, sleeping lots cause bro is over watching the kids, yay.  I have made a new accnt for Myself, and I dont know how to get from this one to that one.  lol  Oh well, I tried.  Kids are outside playing in puddles as I type.  I had to let E out there to cause he was so upset he couldn't play cause he is sick.  He is on anti bios so he should be alright.  Gives Me a moment to write.  Hmmm I have an idea, hope it works.

Hello again,  Well all the stress of this morning, which by the way was the fault of the pharmacy, because the doctor actually phoned in the prescription, but the pharmacy took the name down wrong, has made Me ill.  At least I am not stressed anymore lol.  Now I am just sick.  Got E has got his medicine.  He will be feeling better in a few days and hopefully so will I.  This is one kick ass anti bio, should do the job splendidly.  I am tired.  Now hubbys brother is coming for dinner, that should be an experience.  Get to listen to the two brothers talk about how their parents screwed them up.  Jeez, I am such a gossip monger.  lol   Not much else to say, laters

FUCK!!!!  FUCK!!!!  FUCK!!!!!  What in intensely frustrating day and it is only half over!!!  I dont want this responsibility, I dont want to be here, I want something else.  Time for a change, now I wish I new how to go about getting a change.  Fuck people are so frustrating.  No doctor will give My son antibiotics even though it is fucking obvious he has an infection.  Well back to his ped this afternoon.  I hate My life.  There it is.  For all intent and purpose it is a good life.  I have everything I could want, a house, a good hubby, good kids, and I hate My life.  So this is what mid life crisis feels like.  I know what I need.  I need spirituality back in My life, but how do I go about getting it there?  Why is it so hard to get there, when I used to live there.  Fuck  I wish I knew how, I wish I could get there again.

I think it is time to give up the ghost.  I think I have to become like all the other suburban mothers and fit it.  Cause if I dont, I am going to have one lonely summer.  Perhaps that is exactly what I need, a summer completely alone, well, never being completely alone, alone with My kids.  Perhaps that is just what I need.  So I think I will dye My hair a nice brown, take the nose ring off and the rings, and just try to blend in with casual, boring clothes and learn how to talk motherspeak and housewifeease.  I dont really see any other way around this dilemma.

I want to go to the festive earth societies "living rivers festival"  I just wish I had someone to go with.  Thinking about going just Me and L, but..well that is complicated at best.  I would still like the company of another adult.  Perhaps I will stay home and weed the garden some more.  God I love working with the earth, it is so satisfying.  It is a challenge to pull out the roots of those weeds too.  Later

Lets see, I have one birthday party to plan.  Working on it.  Today I spent a lot of it trying to figure out what courses I am taking next year.  But then I am trying to figure out what courses I need to graduate.  I need to go back on monday and figure it out with ppl in the know.  Tomorrow, a couple of hours to Myself.  That will be nice.  Sat spice comes over and we have a serious chat, then some play ;)  It will be very very very nice. I am looking forward to it.  I dont know why I write in this thing.  Everything I really want to say I dont feel is appropriate for this venue.  I should keep a written journal as well as this and everytime I write in this one, about mundane nothing much shit, I will write the real stuff in the real journal.  Sounds like a plan.  But then who would comment on it? *g*

Tell Me, why can't we all feel like afterglow all the time.  I think that would mean an end to war and such.  Cant fight in the afterglow of sex.  Five and a half hours of sleep last night, interupted by a little one quiet a few times.  I dont feel it now, perhaps tonight, definitely tomorrow.  E is full blown sick now, staying home from school and L has something going on in his nose too.  Welcome to My life.  But thats ok, I will stay home today and take it easy, as easy as I can with both kids here.  I think I have to do a serious cleansing of bad feelings in this house, it seems they are lingering and I am feeling them, cause I haven't been truly content since we moved in.  I think the tele room is not good feng shui for starters.  I can't wait to get the couch, then I can really start making that room look good.  I want to move our bed upstairs too.  One should always sleep with head to the north and feet to the south, it aligns some sort of particles in the body.  I think it will do wonders for the look of the bedroom as well.  However, I cannot do it until the little one is out of our room, cause his bed wont fit beside ours without blocking the closet.  ach well.  Have to deal with all the wierd dreams for a while longer.

Ok back to the journal, I was so rudely cut off by a few family members....
MOVIE REVIEW:  Do not, I mean NOT go see The Scorpian King!  Very little dialogue, lots and lots of fighting.  The thing I enjoyed about the fighting is the women fought and held their own.  I can get into that.  Dialogue sucked, but the rock was curiously good looking throughout most of it, must be the rugged hunka hunka, built like an ox, (wonder if he is hung like one?)  OH yeah, I just remembered who the rock is engaged to, cant remember her name though, big blonde sex thing.....Righhhht Pamela Anderson!  I wish them both all the luck in the world, (guffaw).  So, definite yuck rating, although lots of eye candy, both male and female.  So back at home, everything is the same, yeah.  Just trying to figure out what the difference is between My old home and this one.  I think I find the tele room much warmer in My old one.  I am finding that time goes faster in this house.  I wonder why?  I could stretch out, enjoy shows, relax in the old home.  Here doesn't feel quiet like that and then it is time to go to bed...boom!  Wierd, perhaps I just have to get the new couch and get used to this house, decorate, yaknow make it Mine.. Aha, hmmmm warm colors, that is what that room needs.  (wheels a turning)  Had chinese food for dinner, prefer sushi though, but E loves his wontons :)  Alright, lots more boring shit going through My mind that I will not write down.  Although it is time to start getting ready for L's b-day party.  A is going to make the invitations, lets see if he does it before he goes away.  Right now he is reading a book.  
Ciao

I broke down and bought two movies last night for the kids, and yes Myself.  Atlantis and Shrek.  Very happy, loved Atlantis.  E is sick again.  Good thing his bio dad fucked up big time and didn't pick him up all weekend.  Man that guy is such a looooooooser!!  Nice day outside, rainy and dark.  Love these days with sick kids.
Why is it when I say I need a break nobody understands or takes me seriously?

Well, woke up with E at five thirty this morning.  Was planning on going back to sleep until the cat had an accident.  I cant find her, she hid in the basement, I sure do hope she is ok.  spice...I am disapointed. You should have phoned if not for one minute, or when you got to your parents.  But that is another story we can chat about another time.  I am still awaiting your schedule for next week.  I suggest you let Me know asap.   I am in dire need of a big frikkin break from everything I have been doing lately, especially the kids.  I dont think I will get that break.  What else is new.  I hope the weather warms up, I am sick of this cold.  Yuck.  Well that is about that.

Well well well.  I have a few minutes to write.  E has the day off school, it feels like the weekend already as A is really having a good time sleeping in.  I can't believe being at home could keep Me so busy, but busy I am.  I have done almost everything, found a cottage and paid half to rent it...E's camp is still eluding Me as to what I should do.  And I have to get working on finding a prof and a subject for My undergrad thesis next year.  So, busy it is.  Great!  I like busy, rather then bored.  But I have a few books to keep Me occupied in the interim.  I wonder why it is that I have so much to say and I get on here and it all just magically goes away.  Wonder if any of the oh two people who actually read this could guess why?  I know *g*  but anyhoot, not much on the plate for this weekend....no really?  Who's going to see spider man!?!?!?  I want to go the sunday after it opens.  I wonder if I could get tickets way in advance as I am sure it will sell out everywhere the first weekend.  Gonna take E to see it, I am soooooo excited!  Good thing simple things keep Me happy.    Later

Had a nice day with spice yesterday...she got her navel peirced!!!!  It looks realllly good.  
Today is going to be a workday for Me. Lots to do, and a relaxation day as I am tired!  Hmmm Beth just signed in, wonder what she is up to today lol  Damn, she's gone. Would love to see her today.  Well, like I always say, My life is anything but boring, even if I dont write down all that is going on in My crazy little head!  And there is a lot in there.  I am going to learn html, so I can make a webpage, very exciting!  That will keep Me busy for a while as well.  I do hope spice or I find a fet night to go to together, as I haven't been to a fet night in years, and to have a beautiful sub on My arms, to play with as I chose in a public venue.  sigh  heaven is just a little bit south of where I am right now.  Well on that note, I am off to plan the summer, E's camp, L's birthday party, housewarming party, and a picnic, not to mention the cottage.  Fun fun fun

My internet is back up!!!!  Down for three days at least, god that sucked!!  But here I am again.  Just out of the shower, hair wet, body dry, feeling pretty good....SNOW ON THE GROUND!!!!  How the frikkin hell did that happen???!!!  Oh well, I have a lunch date with My brother today and reading the book you gave to Me spice...cant seem to put it down for some reason. *g*  Having a good time, snow or no snow.  So much to say, so little brain power to remember it all.  Perhaps I should go finish getting ready.

Ya know, if I do this long enough, I will memorize that whole list of moods.  Well I had a most disturbing dream last night.  Now this is going to sound corny, but if one looks at it in a very real way, it was disturbing.  L was possessed by someone who was dead but I had known and this person was pure evil.  So L was trying to kill Me, I think.  He was strong, but not strong enough so I just kept fending him off and trying to talk to the spirit to leave him.  I awoke with a very foreboding feeling.  That was at five, then at five forty five the thunderstorm came in.  It was great, woke Me and E up, however, I couldn't get back to sleep after.  I couldnt really enjoy the tstorm either because I still had that foreboding feeling.  Well, all better now.  Looks like A will be staying in town next week.  Seems like spice and I are never destined to get together, but ya know, it is a wonderful test of patience for both of us.  God must be a Dom/me.

Well, sping has come, some would say summer.  I feel muuuuch better.  I think I need to move somewhere warm all year round, for My psyche of course.  Yesterday was fun, going downtown to walk Queen street with spice.  She is so funny, saying I am in her part of the town now.  I had to remind her that it was My haunt before she ever laid eyes on it.  Hmmmm think that dates Me?  Yeah, I am not young anymore, but of course, I dont care.  I feel young at heart, that I do.  Stay young forever, thats what I say.  But hold to your responsibilities, I guess it is a balancing act, hmmmm.  Perhaps that is what life is about, balancing...balancing the budget, balancing relationships, balancing lifestyles, balancing who we are and who we want to be.  To quote Buddha, "the middle road is the best"  Keep everything in balance.  On that note, been out for a couple days, now time to clean house....and the cat.  Since we let him out back, his fur is yuuuuucky.  Time for a brushin of those two critters.

Update, grandfather is getting anti bios, hopefully they wont have to cut the leg off.  So we wait.  I just found a couple of books that I brought home from My parents, so I can disappear into them and be a little less trapped in this house.  Funny how everything can change from one minute to the next.  A goes into work today cause tomorrow looks to be gorgeous, we will do family tomorrow, it will be wonderful.  

laters

Yesterday I found out that My grandfather went into the hospital to get his leg amputated, gangrene.  They say there is a good chance he wont come out alive.  Too early to find out.  If he has died, or will in the near future, which is imminent, it will be My first funeral.  Oh, I never thought of the fact that My mom is going to have to sit shiva, I wonder if she will do that.  She was not very close to her parents, or perhaps she was too close, but not in a good way.  Anyway, I was definitely not close to them, so I would feel very little about his passing.  

Now, here I sit, saturday, and once more spending the day inside the house with two kids.  Gives Me a little bit of an opportunity to clean, cause I am making the housewarming invites today!!!!  I am having a party at the end of this month come hell or high water!  Ok, thats it for today.

I feel better today.  Whoohooo.  I think it was all that warm weather yesterday, and lots more to come.  Me and the kids had a picnic on the deck in the backyard yesterday, it was fun.  We stayed out for the rest of the afternoon as well.  Time to go, company is coming.

Here is a thought....  Fact: energy can neither be created or destroyed.  So when one emotes, they give off energy, of anger, or love, there is an energy there.  So, we can make the leap that emotion carries a certain energy.  Therefore if there is an emotion that one is trying to not feel, then the energy of that emotion stays with the person, because it cannot be felt.  This is the thought of many a guru and spiritual people.  Well, I cant shake this angry feeling.  It just creeps up and lashes out.  Perhaps it is circumstance, I am going on three weeks hardly leaving My house, being sick and taking care of sick people.  Perhaps it is from times past as well, when things have made Me angry but I have not had a chance to express the anger, but have held it back, which is basically what I have to do now...no choice.  All I know is, I feel very trapped, and that is making Me angry.  Perhaps it is also due to the fact that I am here sick, taking care of two kids and A is out having dinner with his boss at a five star restaurant until ten at night.  I know he had no choice, but it is still getting to Me, big time.

OK, said I was a prisoner in My own house.  Correction, prisoner in My own body.  Day three and I still feel like shit.  It makes Me angry, especially when it is so beautifully warm outside, raining or not, it is warm!   Well, that leaves Me feeling rather angry.  So I will fuss and fume and home and no one will care and that will be the extent of My life for a while.  In the immortal words of My talking scale..."Have a nice day".

Here I sit, again, a prisoner in My own house.  I am sick.  E threw up this morning...twice so he is home and of course the little one is home.  Talk about adult interaction deprivation.  I guess there are worse places I could be a prisoner of than this house.  Ok, movie review time.  Hedwig and the angry inch.  Very unique if you go for the transexual with a twist, good, really good music musical.  Sounds like another movie I can think of, but alas, nothing like it.  It ends up being about one persons becoming whole.  Very interesting..must get soundtrack.  Dont say a word, about a  psychiatrist who has to get a number out of one of his patients heads, because his daughter was kidnapped.  Predictable, however, I enjoyed the young girls performance.    Princess and the Warrior.  A german film, subtitles.  She works in a mental institution, he is an extremely troubled man.  He saves her life, she goes searching for him and ends up saving him...but I wont tell you how.  Must see movie!  The germans are coming out with a lot of worthwhile films these days, kudo's.  Well that is it for now.  My life is so interesting, perhaps one day I will see it as a movie.  Then what?

I had the most wonderful dream last night.  I dreamt I was in a school, not unlike the Marketplace.  However this one was bigger and had a lot more ppl.  There was more to the dream before this took place, but this is what I remember most.  I am new, and we had to get ready for dinner.  I couldn't find my clothes and then the shorts were too big.  Let me describe the dinner attire for slaves, as I was training to be one...black very short shorts in nylon and a black mesh shirt that showed off my tits beautiffully.  Anyway I took far too long and the HeadMaster punished me by making me lie on the floor on my stomach face down.  Let me describe this feeling I had while I was there, submitting completely to this man..."this is home, this is exactly where I am meant to be, this feels damn good and damn right"  Back at my room I begged him to let me eat cause everyone else had finished, he said yes.  I went downstairs and one of the servants said the gym was that way but I said I was going to the kitchen, so she pointed the way.  There were other ppl sitting at a table, definitely not slaves.  They beckoned me over there and I sat with them, they gave me all kinds of desserts and I started to say no I need real food and then thought better off it.  One person offered me something and I took a handful and started eating unti l realized as one of them took one from my hand, that I am still the slave and should be offering these to all of them first and then I can eat what is left.  I started offering them around the table to each person and again I got that, this is where I belong feeling.  I woke with that wonderful feeling in the pit of my stomach.  That is where I belong.
Well just had to write that most wonderful dream out.  Yay
I think I am doing better this morning.  A and I chatted last night and got some things sorted out.  Had a scene but I really wasn't into it.  Did it anyway, and then that glorious dream.  Now if I could live in a dreamworld like that every night, I would be one happy camper!
Ciao

Well, sitting here, taking just a few moment from putting My power point presentation together.  Spice, love you hon, lets get together real soon.  Now both kids are sick.  L is on day six with a fever that averages 102.  Looks like E has the same flu, or whatever the hell it is.  I am starting a cold, I think because I am run down and stressed and just plain insane these days.  Would help if I had some emotional support, but alas I have found there is little support for those who continually support others.  Might be that I have a big problem asking friends and loved ones for support.  That does not help certainly.  I am trying to just put it all aside and work on My presentation.  It is going soooo slow cause I have the two kids now as well.  Although E. is pretty good just watching tele and all.  The little one wants lots of attention, but that is the way of little ones.  Anyway, back to the presentation on euthanasia and assisted suicide.  
Sometimes I think that it is morbid, but most of the time, I just find it fascinating.  Hey spice... is it just us or is it a jewish thing to be fascinated with death?  Helps to believe in reincarnation, as I do.  I am thinking, there is so much here that perhaps I will do My undergrad thesis on this topic.  Tis an idea.
Ciao for now
